suite.name: suiteWebTesting

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Caso de Teste 01: Pesquisar produto existente

kw.name: Acessar a página home do site Automation Practice
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome do produto "Blouse" no campo pesquisar
kw.sourcename: Digitar o nome do produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo pesquisar

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Blouse' into text field 'xpath=//input[@class='search_query form-control ac_input'][contains(@id,'top')]'.
